text: Okay, now let's look at the content structure of this module. Firstly, on slide 3, we look again, so we consolidate this learning, the knowledge matrix, and what part of that knowledge matrix the absorption section sits. In slide 4, we look at just the overall module structure, what we'll be looking at throughout the whole module. Slide 5 and 6, we start defining what is absorption. Slide 8 to 10, we look at trading strategies around order book absorption events, which always makes it exciting when we start having to deploy the right trading strategies when we observe absorption patterns and then slide 11, we have the live drill practice to consolidate your learning at the end of this module.
